DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety two different drug treatment patient diagnosed memory difficulty decline cognitive function . This parallel distribution : group patient treat combination Panax Ginseng + Ginkgo Biloba + multivitamin + Polyminerals ( EMS ) , another group Ginkgo Biloba ( Tebonin ® ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Panax Ginseng + Associations Ginkgo Biloba Treatment Cognitive Function Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: STUDY DESIGN : - multicenter , phase III , double-blind , randomized entry patient , prospective comparative - The duration study : 60 day - 3 visit ( day 1 , 30 60 ) - Evaluate effectiveness association - Evaluate safety combination - Adverse event evaluation
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients race , sex , age 1860 year ; 2 . Patients present two symptom associate disorder cognitive function memory impairment , poor concentration , depress mood , decrease mental capacity , provide score value 24 evaluation psychometric test ( Mini Testmental WMSR Logical Memory ) ; 3 . Consent patient ( Signature IC ) ; 4 . Patients able read write ; 5 . `` Washout '' least two week start study , case use multivitamins medication symptomatic treatment disorder cognitive function . 6 . Women childbearing potential must submit βHCG negative serum ; 7 . Patients able understand carry study procedure ; 1 . Patients hypersensitivity component formula ; 2 . Patients make use levodopa salicylate ; 3 . Routine use medication alter cognitive function barbiturate , anticonvulsant , benzodiazepine , neuroleptic , alcohol illicit drug ; 4 . Pregnant lactating woman ; 5 . Participation another clinical trial investigational medication last 3 month ; 6 . Patients prior knowledge infectious disease ; 7 . Patients take multivitamin medication symptomatic treatment disorder cognitive function , least two week prior study initiation . 8 . Patients organic dementias Alzheimer 's , Pick 's disease , CreutzfeldtJacob Disease , Huntington 's , Parkinson 's disease , dementia cause human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hypothyroidism , vascular dementia ( arteriosclerotic dementia ) , dementia senile among others ;
